languages.text: {n}Несмотря на попытки Махария подавить свое отвращение, присутствие нелюдей в вашей компании явно отзывается в Зауэрбэке ревностным желанием истреблять врагов Человечества.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Несмотря на попытки Махария подавить свое отвращение, присутствие не-людей в вашей компании явно отзывается в Зауэрбеке ревностным желанием защищать постулаты Империума и истреблять ксеносскую нечисть".

languages.text: {n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на попытки Махария подавить свое отвращение, присутствие нелюдей в вашей компании явно отзывается в Зауэрбэке ревностным желанием истреблять врагов Человечества.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In spite of Macharias's attempts to curb his disgust, the presence of the abhumans in your retinue echoes in his heart with a zealous desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}
{n}In spite of Macharias's attempts to curb his disgust, the presence of the abhumans in your retinue echoes in his heart with a zealous desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}
{n}In spite of Macharius' attempts to curb his disgust, the presence of the abhumans in your retinue echoes in his heart with an itch to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}
{n}In spite of Macharius' attempts to curb his disgust, the presence of the abhumans in your retinue echoes in his heart with an itch to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}
{n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}
{n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは不快感を表に出さないよう努めているものの、あなたの供人に亜人がいるために、人類の敵を排除したくてうずうずしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは不快感を表に出さないよう努めているものの、あなたの供人に亜人がいるために、人類の敵を排除したくてうずうずしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，尽管苏尔贝克极力掩饰他的厌恶，但你身边带着异形同伴这件事仍然让他如芒在背，恨不得立刻消灭人类之敌。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，尽管马卡里乌斯极力掩饰他的厌恶，但你有异形同伴这件事仍然让他如芒在背，恨不得立刻消灭人类之敌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Même si Sauerback tente tant bien que mal de cacher le profond dégoût que les non-humains de votre entourage lui inspirent, il ne fait aucun doute que la gâchette le démange.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Même si Macharius tente tant bien que mal de cacher le profond dégoût que les abhumains de votre entourage lui inspirent, il ne fait aucun doute que la gâchette le démange.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de los intentos de Sauerback por ocultar el asco que siente ante la presencia de los inhumanos en tu séquito, puedes percibir claramente su deseo de exterminar a los enemigos de la Humanidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de los intentos de Macharius por ocultar el asco que siente por la presencia de los pseudohumanos en tu séquito, se nota que lo que querría hacer es acabar con ellos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sauerback bemüht sich, seinen Abscheu nicht zu zeigen, doch die Anwesenheit von Abhumanen in deinem Gefolge lässt sicher sein brennendes Verlangen auflodern, die Feinde der Menschheit auszulöschen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz Macharius' Versuchen, seinen Ekel zu zügeln, hallt die Anwesenheit der Abhumanen in deinem Gefolge in seinem Herzen wider und löst das brennende Verlangen aus, die Feinde der Menschheit auszulöschen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maiyetindeki insan dışı mahluklara gösterdiği tepki, tiksintisini gizleme çabalarına rağmen Sauerback'in İnsanlık düşmanlarını yok etme arzusunu açıkça yansıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite Sauerback's attempts to suppress his revulsion, the presence of inhumans in your retinue undoubtedly reflects his fervent desire to eliminate the enemies of Humanity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maiyetindeki insan dışı mahluklara gösterdiği tepki, tiksintisini gizleme çabalarına rağmen Sauerback'in İnsanlık düşmanlarını yok etme arzusunu açıkça yansıtıyor.{/n}
